item.title: A new bench has been put in at the bus stop. Rather than replacing the position the old one was in (opposite my front door) it has been positioned directly opposite my living room and bedroom windows., 2nd October
item.description:
The bus stop at the top of old bath road (where it joins leckhampton Road) was damaged a few years ago when a dangerous driver drove straight into it. The bench that was destroyed has been replaced recently, however it has been put in a different position. The old bench used to be over the road from my front door , which I had no issue with. The new one has been put in whilst I was on holiday and looks directly into my living room and bedroom windows, constituting a massive invasion of my privacy and meaning people sit on the bench looking into my house. I was not consulted about the new position of the bench and believe it should have been replaced in the position it was originally. The new bench has been put in closer to a dangerous road corner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Bath Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
